attributes.action: Free Parking for NHS Staff on a permanent basis.
attributes.additional_details: We would like the government to mandate free parking for all NHS Staff whilst at work.
attributes.background: Our NHS Staff work extremely hard for all of our benefit and often work longer hours than they're contracted to. During the recent pandemic, it became clear that many NHS Staff have received parking fines whilst at work and have been forced to pay by the private companies that manage NHS car parks.
